name: Raptor: Cretaceous Island
description: Built exclusively for VR, Raptor: Cretaceous Island is a first-person shooter that lets you explore an island that has been overrun by deadly raptors. You must survive, whilst trying to complete various missions in order to restore the power and computer systems on the Island. Watch your back!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
